attributes.action: stop pretending this site will make a difference
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So far every single petition I have signed has been answered as though you know best, especially regarding the national road tolls.  If this site is going to be seen as a force for change or the voice of the people then their concerns must be seen to be taken seriously and that the initial petitioner has done their research.  currently they are treated as though they don't know how to suck eggs, as the answers are just regurgitated and skirting often issues raised.  when was the last time this site made you change your mind and policy?
